inclusion.criterion: Ambulatory patients with HCV cirrhosis will be screened for participation in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to complete Number Connection Test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients determined to possibly meet the West Haven criteria grade 0 or 1 for HE
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of alcohol abuse within six months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of agents that alter intestinal motility, e.g., methadone, cholestyramine,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of Neomycin or other antibiotics within the past 2 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man with mild Parkinson's disease. He has hypertension and hypercholesterolemia, but no signs of dementia.
